name: frisk

effect.sun_moon: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.

short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
